content: Hello world! Are you ready for Patagon? Join me and together we will reach the moon.What is Patagon?Patagon is a fair launch DeFi token on Binance Smart Chain with real utility. The Patagon token has no taxes on purchases and sales.Patagon is Binance's Doge Coin. Patagon token Next 1000x Gem - 100% SAFE. The Patagon token is a currency whose purpose is to be used within an ecosystem made up of service platforms such as markets based on local tourism and the sale of services, among other projects. You can buy or sell the Patagon token and you will not have to pay taxes on the purchase or sale. No more coins will be minted.Is the Patagon token safe?Sure, you can check it at: https://gopluslabs.io/token-security/56/0x14149f633c76ebbce08e8b748ef7eeb0410608b5ProjectThe Patagon token is a currency whose purpose is to be used within an ecosystem made up of service platforms such as markets based on local tourism and the sale of services, among other projects. The coin will be used both for the creation of these projects by investing in them initially, and for its use as a means of purchase and payment on these platforms. Patagon is a real project that will be constantly evolving.TokenThere were no initial token burns. There were also no airdrops. There are no team tokens. No more coins will be minted. There are no surcharges for coin purchases or sales. A fair launch of the coin was made. Initial liquidity was added to the PATAGON and BNB Pancakeswap pair.The Patagon token will have two uses:• Project financing• Payment method in the Patagon ecosystemToken name:PatagonToken symbol: PATAGONMax Supply: 100,000,000,000 PATAGONToken type: BEP-20Contract address: 0x14149f633c76ebbce08e8b748ef7eeb0410608b5Smart Contract in BSCSAN: https://bscscan.com/token/0x14149f633c76ebbce08e8b748ef7eeb0410608b5Web: https://patagontoken.com/Whitepaper: https://patagontoken.com/whitepaper.pdfTelegram: https://t.me/PatagonTokenTwitter: https://twitter.com/PatagonTokenPancakeswap BNB/PATAGON pool: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?outputCurrency=0x14149f633c76eBbcE08e8b748eF7eEB0410608b5Liquidity is locked: https://bscscan.com/tx/0x341f70012adee9c3c648b6836265b69853cc32f3f3d1f8e8007d9a586a3bf757Patagon is Binance's Doge CoinThank you!
